alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 4:25PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...ICY CONDITIONS FOR THE EVENING COMMUTE... Temperatures were at or are expected to drop into the upper 20s to around 30 through 6pm with light freezing rain and freezing drizzle across the region. The freezing rain will coat untreated roadways and walkways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Yonkers, Paterson, Stamford, Norwalk, New Rochelle, Flushing, Passaic, White Plains, Wayne, Mott Haven, Hoboken, Bloomfield and East Tremont. A Winter Weather Advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements.
